sentences.en: A survivor was knocked unconscious when the helicopter ditched.
sentences.cn: 在直升机紧急迫降时，一名幸存者被撞昏过去。

sentences.en: All the time Stephen was lying face down and unconscious in the bath tub.
sentences.cn: 斯蒂芬一直脸朝下趴在浴缸里，不省人事。

sentences.en: Doreen appeared to be unconscious of the amusement she had caused.
sentences.cn: 多琳似乎并未意识到她把大家逗乐了。

sentences.en: He himself seemed totally unconscious of his failure.
sentences.cn: 他本人似乎对自己的失败全然不知。

sentences.en: He knelt down beside the unconscious girl.
sentences.cn: 他跪在那个失去知觉的女孩身边.

sentences.en: He was obviously distressed despite being unconscious.
sentences.cn: 虽然他自己未发觉，但他显然很忧心。

sentences.en: He was unconscious of his mistake.
sentences.cn: 他没意识到自已的错误.

sentences.en: Mark was lying unconscious but with no outward sign of injury.
sentences.cn: 马克躺在那儿昏迷不醒，但看不出受伤的迹象。

sentences.en: She remained unconscious for several hours.
sentences.cn: 她不省人事有好几个小时.

sentences.en: She was found alive but unconscious.
sentences.cn: 她被找到时还活着，但已不省人事。

sentences.en: She was unconscious but her heart was still beating.
sentences.cn: 她已经不省人事,但脉搏还在跳.

sentences.en: There was something in the darker recesses of his unconscious that was troubling him.
sentences.cn: 在他更为隐秘的潜意识深处，有什么事情困扰着他。

sentences.en: Unconscious envy manifests itself very often as this kind of arrogance.
sentences.cn: 潜意识里的嫉妒常表现为这种傲慢自大。

sentences.en: We were set upon by about twelve youths and I was kicked unconscious.
sentences.cn: 我们遭到了大约12名青年的袭击，我被踢晕过去了。

words.tran_cn: 无意识；意识不清；[医] 人事不省

trans.tran_cn: 不省人事的，无意识的，未觉察的，潜意识的
trans.tran_en: unable to see, move, feel etc in the normal way because you are not conscious
